root.name: % (modulo)

example.code: int a = 20%100; // Sets a to 20 int b = 20%100; // Sets b to 20 int c = 75%100; // Sets c to 75 int d = 275%100; // Sets d to 75

root.description: Calculates the remainer when one number is divided by another. It is extremely useful for keeping numbers within a boundary such as keeping a shape on the screen.
